sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*,rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT row_number()over (ORDER BY seq ASC) as rown,seq,board_chk,title,content,readcount,rp_seq, to_char(write_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date,brc_id FROM board WHERE rp_seq = 0
AND title like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND content like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND brc_id like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY rown DESC ) A ) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum#
SELECT b.seq,b.title, b.content, b.readcount, b.write_date, b.filename, brc_id, c.brc_name FROM board b join branch c USING (brc_id) WHERE b.seq = #seq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET readcount = readcount + 1 WHERE seq = #seq#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT nvl(min(seq), #seq#) as next_seq FROM BOARD
WHERE seq > #seq#

SELECT nvl(max(seq),#seq#) as prev_seq FROM BOARD
WHERE seq < #seq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET title = #title# , content = #content#, filename = #filename# WHERE seq = #seq#
